charges.charge_disposition: 30 mos imprisonment to be served concurrently for total term of 30 mos; TSR 36 mos to be served concurrently for total term of 36 mos; S/A $500 due immediately; recommendation - 500-hr substance abuse treatment program in California; restitution $660; fine waived; right to appeal given. Motion to Dismiss remaining counts is GRANTED; defendant ordered to remain in custody pending transfer to Bureau of Prisons (BOP)
